reason.success: Successfully set reason for case {{- case}}
reason.success_multiple: Successfully set reason for case range {{- lower_case}} to {{- upper_case}} (`{{current}}/{{count}}` cases)

clear.success: Successfully cleared `{{count}}` message by $t(command.mod.clear.authors, {"count": {{author_count}}}) sent in `{{time}}`

status.success: Successfully set status of report {{- report}} to `$t(log.report_log.report_status.{{status}})`

recently_reported.message: This message has already been recently reported, thanks for making our community a better place!

errors.invalid_attachment: Invalid attachment, only images are allowed.

common.warnings:
**Attention:** We are not Discord and we **cannot** moderate {{- trust_and_safety}} issues.
**Creating false reports may lead to moderation actions.**

modal.label: The reason for the report
modal.placeholder: Please enter a detailed reason for the report

message.pending:
Are you sure you want to report {{- message_link}} to the server moderators?

message.success_forward: Successfully forwarded message to existing report, thanks for making our community a better place!
